results.title: Progressive intracranial vascular disease with strokes and seizures in a boy with progeria.
results.text_hl: A 5-year-old boy developed signs of @<m>DISEASE_Progeria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011371 @@@progeria@@@ at 4 months and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ at 4 years, treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Dipyridamole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004176 @@@dipyridamole@@@.

citations.NLM: Rosman NP, Anselm I, Bhadelia RA. Progressive intracranial vascular disease with strokes and seizures in a boy with progeria. J Child Neurol. 2001 Mar;16(3):212-5. PMID: 11305689
